title: AYBU E-sports Cup
description: Join us for the first annual AYBU E-sports Cup featuring tournaments in popular games like League of Legends, Fortnite, and Counter-Strike: Global Offensive.

title: AYBU Gaming Night
description: Join us for a night of gaming and fun with fellow AYBU students. We'll have tournaments, free play, and snacks!

title: League of Legends Tournament
description: Join our League of Legends tournament for a chance to win prizes and show off your skills. Open to all AYBU students.

title: Cs Go Tournament
description: Join our Counter Strike Global Offensive tournament for a chance to win prizes and show off your skills. Open to all BYU students.

title: Pubg Tournament
description: Join our Player Unknown Battlegrounds tournament for a chance to win prizes and show off your skills. Open to all BYU students.

title: Dota 2 Tournament
description: Join our Dota 2 Tournament for a chance to win prizes and show off your skills. Open to all AYBU students.

title: Overwatch 2 Tournament
description: Join our Overwatch 2 tournament for a chance to win prizes and show off your skills. Open to all AYBU students.

title: FIFA 2023 Championship
description: Compete in the FIFA 2023 Championship and showcase your football gaming expertise. Open to all AYBU students.
